function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited empirical work on COVID-19 and entrepreneurship","Impact":"Lack of understanding of long-term repercussions of the crisis","Mitigation":"Conduct detailed case studies and research on the impact of COVID-19 on entrepreneurship","Technologies":"Research methodologies and data analysis tools","People":"Small business owners, entrepreneurs","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"},{"Description":"Uncertain government policy measures","Impact":"Challenges in navigating through the crisis for small businesses","Mitigation":"Regular updates on government policies, support from government agencies","Technologies":"Policy tracking tools, communication platforms","People":"Small business owners, entrepreneurs","Owner":"Government agencies, policy analysts"},{"Description":"New variant of COVID-19 driving increased transmission","Impact":"Higher risk of disease spread","Mitigation":"Fast implementation of public health measures, vaccination programs","Technologies":"Genomic sequencing, vaccine development","People":"General population","Owner":"Public health agencies, research institutions"}]}
